review: I was so excited to get this stick. We just downgraded our cable and kept our high speed internet and then purchased this stick. The first day I plugged it in I had problems. I called the help number and they did help me in getting the stick to work and to stay connected to the Internet. This worked great all day and night, the next morning....and then started having major internet issues again. It kept dropping the connection. I called Amazon and they said it was on their end and their connection seemed to be like a roller coaster. I had asked if there were others complaining of the same issue and he said yes, quite a few actually. So I am returning this and just bought the Roku 2. Love it. Haven't had one issue yet.
author: Danielle Vanallen
